subject: CNN Alerts: bush
body:
CNN Alerts: bush






 



Alert Name: bush
Invasive plants wear out their welcome

06/05/07 01:01 PM, EDT
Bamboo-like plants that grow taller than adults have choked out native plants in a marsh that once teemed with life in at Maumee Bay State Park along Lake Erie. Wild flowers have disappeared. Migrating birds have gone elsewhere.
FULL STORY
